sense.def:
To treat someone or something in a particular way
pomeni vesti se do nečesa ali nekoga na določen način.

seg.quote: Their parents continue to treat them as children.
Electricity is potentially dangerous, so treat it with respect.

sense.def:
Kadar zdravnik
treats a patient or an illness
, poskuša bolniku pomagati, da bi ozdravel.

Kadar les ali blago
is treated
, nanj nanesemo posebno snov, da ga zavarujemo ali mu damo posebne lastnosti.

seg.quote: New timber should be treated with a preservative.

sense.def:
To give someone a treat
pomeni nekomu kupiti ali prirediti nekaj posebnega, kar ga bo razveselilo.

seg.quote: Granny took us for tea at Lyons Corner House as a special treat.
